title: Reflections of El: In Search of Self
description: Even nice people must have a dark side This book follows the tribulations and learning experiences of a young man named Dyllon. He finds that having a loving family is a valuable foundation but can also be a source of confusion. Dyllon learns that the dark side of his personality is needed to help grow him into an adult but romance is tied to his hurting others. Does this dark side have a mind of its own or is it Dyllon being so hurtful? Join Dyllon on his quest to understand life, love and the demons that persistently haunt him in this part autobiographical but always entertaining tale.
author: Lloyd A. Green
